name: Viral
description: A straightforward and exhilarating first-person-shooter game that runs on all platforms (including mobile phones)! Pick a side, join the army of Viruses or White-Blood-Cells, and invade/protect the human body as you defeat your enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
